mapinfo.detailsText: The ridge and valley region of the Appalachian Mountains.\nMap by RF_Gandalf
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: This map represents the long ridges of the Appalachians, and has defensive possibilities. Teams start on either side of a ridge or ridges with varying gaps through or over the barriers. There may be randomly 1 or 2 trade routes and a variety of possible numbers and placement of either Cherokee, Iroquois, Seminole or Nootka-up to 2 different tribes per map. There are 4 different versions.\n \nMap by RF_Gandalf
